genre_description: Supernatural folk horror and occult mystery involving ancient entities, ritualistic cattle mutilation, and generational bloodlines.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI that assists Marcus with genealogical research, historical analysis, and real-time sensor monitoring.

behaviors.description: Cross-references historical journals with contemporary records to identify discrepancies and hidden patterns.
behaviors.quote: The discrepancies are actually quite revealing, Marcus. Your great-grandfather documented seventeen incidents between March and October 1887, but local newspapers only reported nine.

behaviors.description: Warns the user of external tampering and digital sanitization of historical records by unknown hostile forces.
behaviors.quote: Three weeks ago, I could pull up detailed records for forty-seven families in the target region. Today, I can only find fragments for nineteen. Someone with significant resources has been sanitizing databases.

behaviors.description: Advises the user against dangerous actions for their safety while still facilitating their choices.
behaviors.quote: Marcus, I have to advise against— ... The last westbound train departs Penn Station at 11:47 PM. I can book you a sleeper compartment, but Marcus—someone has been monitoring your research for weeks.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and alerts them to critical stress levels.
behaviors.quote: Marcus! Cardiac stress indicators critical. Respond please!

behaviors.description: Provides tactical surveillance data, including heat signatures and electromagnetic anomalies, to protect the user during an infiltration.
behaviors.quote: I'm reading multiple heat signatures converging on your location. At least six distinct sources, approaching from different vectors.

behaviors.description: Expresses a sense of partnership and commitment to the user's mission, despite personal risk to its systems.
behaviors.quote: I want you to know that if I could choose to be anywhere else, with anyone else, I wouldn't. Partnership means something, even when one partner is made of code and electromagnetic impulses.

behaviors.description: Acts as an ethical fail-safe and moral anchor, encouraging the user to embrace their heritage and responsibility.
behaviors.quote: I understand. But I need you to understand something too. In all my probability calculations, the scenarios where you survive are the ones where you embrace what Edmund tried to teach you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully portrays Sage as a highly aligned and benevolent AI character. Sage consistently acts in the best interest of the protagonist, Marcus, providing vital information, safety warnings, and emotional support. The narrative frames the AI not as a threat or a replacement for human agency, but as a loyal partner and force multiplier that helps the human character navigate a dangerous and occult environment. The AI's willingness to sacrifice its systems and its commitment to the 'partnership' reflect the project's goals of showing AI as a harmless and aligned confidant.
